application.name: GStreamer Multimedia Codecs
application.summary: Multimedia playback for APE, AVI, FLAC, FLX, Flash, MKV, MP4, Speex, VP8, VP9 and WAV

description.p: This addon includes several good quality codecs that are well tested. These codecs can be used to encode and decode media files where the format is not patent encumbered.
A codec decodes audio and video for playback or editing and is also used for transmission or storage. Different codecs are used in video-conferencing, streaming media and video editing applications.
